info.description: The Azure SQL Database management API provides a RESTful set of web services that interact with Azure SQL Database services to manage your external server administrators.
info.title: Azure SQL Database API spec

get.description: Returns a list of server Administrators.

parameters.description: The API version to use for the request.
parameters.name: api-version

parameters.description: The subscription ID that identifies an Azure subscription.
parameters.name: subscriptionId

parameters.description: The name of the resource group that contains the resource. You can obtain this value from the Azure Resource Manager API or the portal.
parameters.name: resourceGroupName

schema.description: The response to a list Active Directory Administrators request.

value.description: The list of server Active Directory Administrators for the server.

tenantId.description: The server Active Directory Administrator tenant id.
